CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: WidePoint Corp is a provider of trusted mobility management (TM2) that offers federally certified communications management, identity management, and interactive bill presentment and analytics solutions. The company's solutions include Telecom Lifecycle Management, Digital billing communications solutions, and Mobile and Identity management.

value.name: Todd Dzyak
